entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
